overview:
James Creech is the Senior Director of Business Development at YTM, one of the fastest growing startups in Los Angeles. With a diverse background encompassing operations, project management, client services, sales, and business development, James leads the media buying and publisher acquisition efforts at YTM. He has years of experience working in such diverse industries as entertainment, online gaming, real estate, law, and social video advertising.

About YTM YTM is a digital advertising agency that creates an optimized social video presence for brands on YouTube. It can make any video go viral, build an engaged subscriber base with its comprehensive channel management strategy, and leverage the influence of YouTube celebrities through video integration campaigns. YTM focuses on finding a videoâ€™s ideal audience and increasing engaged viewers, subscribers, and followers to develop owned media over time. Visit www.weareytm.com to learn more.
